Title: Footage posted to social media shows the apparent interception of...
Description: Footage posted to social media shows the apparent interception of a Hezbollah drone over northern Israel this evening.

Title: The Israeli military and Shin Bet security agency say they have v...
Description: The Israeli military and Shin Bet security agency say they have verified the deaths of 19 Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad operatives in this mornings airstrike on the Tabaeen school in Gaza City.According to the IDF, the strike was carried out against the Hamas and Islamic Jihad command room embedded within a mosque at the school complex with three precision munitions.The IDF says that the missiles could not have caused the damage that corresponds to the casualty reports of the government media office in Gaza.The military says that footage from after the strike shows that there is no major damage to the surrounding school complex. Video is too big

Title: Footage posted to social media purports to show a Hezbollah drone...
Description: Footage posted to social media purports to show a Hezbollah drone flying over northern Israel. Sirens have been sounding across the Galilee in the past 20 minutes.

Title: Suspected drone sirens continue sound in northern Israel, reachin...
Description: Suspected drone sirens continue sound in northern Israel, reaching as far as the Lower Galilee city of Maghar.

Title: Earlier this evening, a barrage of 10 rockets was fired from Leba...
Description: Earlier this evening, a barrage of 10 rockets was fired from Lebanon at the Western Galilee.According to the IDF, all the rockets struck open areas, causing no injuries.The IDF adds that troops shelled the launch sites with artillery.Hezbollah took responsibility for the attack, claiming to have bombarded the northern community of Eilon with Katyusha rockets, in response to recent IDF strikes in southern Lebanon.

Title: The suspected drone sirens are now sounding in Safed.
Description: The suspected drone sirens are now sounding in Safed.

Title: Suspected drone infiltration sirens sounding across the Galilee.
Description: Suspected drone infiltration sirens sounding across the Galilee.

Title: Israeli fighter jets reportedly flying over Beirut, causing sonic...
Description: Israeli fighter jets reportedly flying over Beirut, causing sonic booms.

Title: A senior member of Hamass general security forces was killed in a...
Description: A senior member of Hamass general security forces was killed in an airstrike in the Gaza Strip yesterday, the military announces.According to the IDF, Walid Alsousi was a member of Hamass military wing as well as the head of a department in the terror groups general security forces in the southern Gaza Strip.The IDF says Alsousi was responsible for building an intelligence picture for Hamas, using sources across Gaza.He was killed yesterday in a fighter jet airstrike, the IDF says.Meanwhile, troops of the 98th Division are pressing on with an offensive in southern Gazas Khan Younis, where the military says troops killed dozens of gunmen and destroyed sites used by terror groups over the past day.Further south, in Rafah, troops with the 162nd Division killed several more gunmen and seized weapons hidden in homes, the IDF says.The IDF also says that this past week, several terrorists who participated in the October 7 onslaught were killed in strikes carried out by the 215th Artillery Regiment. Video is too big

Title: ?? The Hamas terror group in a statement claims that there were n...
Description: Mannies War Room: The IDF in an update on the deadly Gaza City school strike says that according to its intelligence, at least 20 terror operatives and senior commanders were at the site when it was struck. According to the military, the active Hamas and Palestinian Islamic? The Hamas terror group in a statement claims that there were no militants in the Tabaeen school in Gaza Citys Daraj neighborhood when it was struck this morning by the IDF.More than 100 people were killed in the strike, according to Hamas authorities. The IDF expressed heavy skepticism toward the claim, saying the numbers appeared to have been inflated.Hamas falsely claims that its fighters and members of other armed groups follow a strict policy of not being present among civilians. In recent months, dozens of airstrikes have been carried out against Hamas sites embedded within schools and other sites used as shelters for civilians, according to the IDF.Just last week, the commander of Hamass Sheikh Radwan Battalion was killed in an IDF strike on a school in Gaza City.According to military assessments, Hamas operatives are struggling to remain inside tunnels for such a long period and are therefore increasingly moving to above-ground sites, while hiding among civilians.

Title: ?? The IDF in an update on the deadly Gaza City school strike say...
Description: Mannies War Room: Early this morning, the IDF says it carried out an airstrike against Hamas operatives at a command room embedded within a school in Gaza City, which had been used as a shelter for displaced Palestinians. According to Palestinian media, more than 100 people? The IDF in an update on the deadly Gaza City school strike says that according to its intelligence, at least 20 terror operatives and senior commanders were at the site when it was struck.According to the military, the active Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad command room was based out of a prayer room in the al-Tabaeen school, in Gaza Citys Daraj neighborhood.The IDF denies claims that more than 100 Palestinians were killed in the strike.According to a preliminary examination, the numbers published by the government media office in Gaza -- which acts as a media arm of Hamas -- are exaggerated and do not match the information available in the IDF, the precise munitions used, and the accuracy of the strike, the IDF says.

Title: Early this morning, the IDF says it carried out an airstrike agai...
Description: Early this morning, the IDF says it carried out an airstrike against Hamas operatives at a command room embedded within a school in Gaza City, which had been used as a shelter for displaced Palestinians.According to Palestinian media, more than 100 people were killed in the strike against the al-Tabiin school in the Daraj neighborhood.The IDF says the command room was used by Hamas operatives as a hideout, and to plan and carry out attacks against troops in Gaza and against Israel.

Title: Hezbollah rocket launchers in southern Lebanons Kfarhamam, primed...
Description: Hezbollah rocket launchers in southern Lebanons Kfarhamam, primed for an attack on northern Israel, were struck by Israeli fighter jets a short while ago, the IDF says.The military adds that other Hezbollah infrastructure was struck in Ayta ash-Shab, Markaba, Mhaibib, and Kafr Kila.

Mannies War Room: The IDF and Shin Bet security agency in a statement confirm carrying out an airstrike in the coastal Lebanese city of Sidon earlier this evening, killing a Hamas commander. According to the military and Shin Bet, Samer al-Hajj was responsible for advancing?

Title: ?? The IDF and Shin Bet security agency in a statement confirm ca...
Description: Mannies War Room: The Saudi-owned al-Arabiya outlet, citing unidentified sources, says that the target of the Israeli drone strike near Sidon is Samer al-Hajj, a Hamas official in charge of security in the Ain al-Hilweh Palestinian refugee camp. The outlet says that both al? The IDF and Shin Bet security agency in a statement confirm carrying out an airstrike in the coastal Lebanese city of Sidon earlier this evening, killing a Hamas commander.According to the military and Shin Bet, Samer al-Hajj was responsible for advancing terror attacks and projectile launches from Lebanon toward Israeli territory.Al-Hajj was the commander of Hamass military forces in the Ain al-Hilweh Palestinian refugee camp near Sidon, and responsible for recruiting and training terrorists to attack the State of Israel, the statement says.Other media reports described al-Hajj as a senior Hamas official who ran security for the terror group in Ain al-Hilweh.

Title: ?? The Saudi-owned al-Arabiya outlet, citing unidentified sources...
Description: Mannies War Room: Lebanese media outlets say there are at least two casualties in the alleged Israeli drone strike near Sidon. The Annahar outlet says that the pair are apparently Hamas members. The Saudi-owned al-Arabiya outlet, citing unidentified sources, says that the target of the Israeli drone strike near Sidon is Samer al-Hajj, a Hamas official in charge of security in the Ain al-Hilweh Palestinian refugee camp.The outlet says that both al-Hajj and another Hamas member were killed in the strike.
